item.title: Have: Fox and Wolf Want:Drops
item.content:encoded:
As the title saysâ€¦
Have:
Fox and Wolf Rune
Fireworks Launcher

Drops i need:
Big Mouth
Claw Card
Firebrand
Fruits Basket
Granola Camouflage
Groupies
Helix Tattoo
Kaiju Memento
Late-Night Snack
Monkey Cymbals
Persocom
Poisoned Daggers
Power Over 9000
Red Water
Shiny Belt
Spirit of the Demon of the Sand
Spirit of the Nine-Tailed Fox
Tire Tracks
Troll Account
Vampire Cloak
Ill trade one for one, but for spirits ill trade both.

I also need these items if you are willing:
Pinchy Claw
Bat of Casper
Book of Follet
Bow of Windia
Whip of Rosa
Golden Band of Courage
Golden Band of Wisdom
Golden Collar of Courage
Golden Collar of Power
Golden Star of Courage
Golden Star of Power
Golden Star of Wisdom
